p: To date there are still no drugs officially approved for treatment of COVID-19. However, as already observed in SARS [ 6, 7], it appears that early treatment with antiviral drugs could improve the natural history of COVID-19 [ 8, 9]. Identifying in advance all subjects at risk of developing severe forms of COVID-19 and treating them with antivirals during early stages of infection could be one strategy to manage the pandemic.
